ModulePrefs.title: Top Friends
ModulePrefs.author: Ning, Inc.
ModulePrefs.description: Show off your top friends, or create new tabs to organize your friends by category.

Module.Content:

.ui-helper-hidden{display:none;}.ui-helper-hidden-accessible{position:absolute;left:-99999999px;}.ui-helper-reset{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;outline:0;line-height:1.3;text-decoration:none;font-size:100%;list-style:none;}.ui-helper-clearfix:after{content:".";display:block;height:0;clear:both;visibility:hidden;}.ui-helper-clearfix{display:inline-block;}/* .ui-slider-range-max{right:0;}.ui-slider-vertical{width:.8em;height:100px;}.ui-slider-vertical .ui-slider-handle{left:-.3em;margin-left:0;margin-bottom:-.6em;}.ui-slider-vertical .ui-tabs-nav{list-style:none;position:relative;padding:.2em .2em 0;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li{position:relative;float:left;border-bottom-width:0!important;margin:0 .2em -1px 0;padding:0;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li a{float:left;text-decoration:none;padding:.5em 1em;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-selected{padding-bottom:1px;border-bottom-width:0;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-selected a,.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-state-disabled a,.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-state-processing a{cursor:text;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li a,.ui-tabs.ui-tabs-collapsible .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-selected a{cursor:pointer;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel{padding:1em 1.4em;display:block;border-width:0;background:none;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-hide{display:none!important;}body{font-size:12px;}img{border:none;}.canvas-view{width:737px;min-height:500px;}.profile-view{width:492px;}.profile-view,.canvas-view{margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;}.owners-only{display:none!important;}.ui-widget-content{background:none;}.ui-tabs{border:none;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav-close{display:none;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-selected .ui-tabs-nav-close{display:inline-block;}.ui-tabs{padding:0 .2em;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel{margin:0;padding:.2em;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel .ui-tabs-panel-header{padding:.5em .3em .3em 1em;position:relative;border:none;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel .ui-tabs-panel-header .title{float:left;margin:.1em 0 .2em;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel-body{border:0;padding:.5em 1em;background:none;overflow:auto;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel-footer{text-align:left;border:none;background-image:none;margin:.5em 0 0;padding:.3em 0 0;}.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel-footer button{float:right;margin:.5em .4em .5em 0;cursor:pointer;padding:.2em .6em .3em .6em;line-height:1.4em;width:auto;overflow:visible;}.ui-widget input,.ui-widget select,.ui-widget textarea,.ui-widget button{margin-right:5px;}.ui-dialog-titlebar-close{display:none;}.canvas-view .friend-list{width:600px;}.profile-view .friend-list{width:300px;}.friend-list{margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;}.friend-list ul{list-style-type:none;margin-left:0;padding-left:0;}.friend-list ul li{display:inline-block;list-style-image:none;list-style-position:outside;list-style-type:none;margin:10;vertical-align:top;position:relative;}.friend-list ul li div.bd{position:relative;padding:8px;text-align:center;width:60px;overflow:hidden;}.friend-list ul li .ib img{width:48px;height:48px;padding-bottom:5px;}.friend-list ul li .tb h3{display:block;font-size 1em;margin-top:0;text-align:center;}.friend-list ul li .ui-icon-close{visibility:hidden;background-color:white;position:absolute;right:0;top:0;}.friend-list ul li:hover .ui-icon-close{visibility:visible;margin-right:16px;margin-top:10px;}.head,.content,.foot{display:block;} </style>
